title: Cadillac confirms Bottas and Pérez for debut 2026 F1 season
summary: Cadillac has officially unveiled Pérez and Bottas as its driver pairing for the brand’s debut in the 2026 F1 season

qa_pairs.question: Which two drivers have been confirmed by Cadillac for their debut in the 2026 Formula 1 season?
In what year is Cadillac set to debut in Formula 1?
What is the significance of Cadillac's entry into Formula 1?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: It marks Cadillac's debut in F1.
wrong_options: It is a merger with another team.
It is the first American team since 2003.
It signifies a switch to hybrid engines.
